rules_text:
[i]Danger Sense[/i] – At the beginning of each combat step, if Nils is untapped, untap another target creature you control.
[i]Quintessence Transfer[/i] – {3}{G}{U}, {T}: Another target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control six or more lands, put two +1/+1 counters on that creature instead. Activate only once each turn.
